full_text: 5R$ DINDIASE CITY CIT WORDS GORD FIVE RUPEES HRR FIVE RUPEES AFFIDAVI I,Mrs.Sant Kaur Uppal wife of Major (Dr.) Dhian Singh Uppal n/o 9,General Carriappa Road, Agra-28 2001 (India) do hereby solemnly declare and affirm as under:- x 1. That Mr.Joginder. Singh Uppal resident of 815, Kenwood, BURBANK,California(U.S.A.) and Mr .Jasvir Singh Uppal resident of A-I/245,Janakpuri, New Delhi-110058 (India) are my sons nd I am mother of both of them. 2. That I am married only to Major (Dr.) Dhian Singh Uppal M.B.E. (Retd.A.M.C.) who is father of both of them. 3. That the date of birth of Mr. Joginder Singh Uppal is 30.6.1942. ( Thirty June , One thousand nine hundred and forty two).His place of birth is -Village DAULTALA (Distt. Rawal- Pindi) ,Pakistan. Deponent 10 08/5/82 Guy oom before we Mrs.Sant Kaur Uppal ) 9, General Carriappa Road, Agra. Verification:- MOHAV Verified that the contents of above affidavit are true best of my knowledge and no part of it is false, nothing 0.4.023 concealed. NOTA RH Verified At Agra on 8-4-82 Deponent
